title: Password
content:
From SmartWiki
 Jump to: 
navigation
, 
search
A secret code that must be entered by the 
user
 in order to log into the system. The complexity of the password is determined though the 
Global Settings
, 
Password Policy
 window under 
Login & Security Settings
.
SmartSimple uses the 
SHA-256
 algorithm, combined with 
salt
 
hashing
, in order to encrypt passwords.
See Also
 
Password Variables to Set or Reset User Passwords
 
Password Policy
 
 Retrieved from ‘
https://wiki.smartsimple.com/index.php?title=Password&oldid=26261
’
